name: All Alone, On This Plateau. (Ludum Dare 43)
name_original: All Alone, On This Plateau. (Ludum Dare 43)
description:
Oh! Look at that, a lovely plant! A plant of life, and prosperity. A plant for our future.

This game was made for Ludum Dare 43, the theme being "Sacrifices must be made".

This game is also very much inspired by "The Giving Tree" by Shel Silverstein, only it is a bit different.

You can follow my twitter here!

My friend Hawksandwich has a lovely discord that I talk in here. Come have a chat with us!
